original: unfold filterlim, filtermap, filter_le, locally. intros P FP. unfold filtermap, filter_le, locally in FP. intros eps. specialize (FP (ball (mult x y) eps)). unfold filtermap, filter_le, locally in FP. simpl in FP. rewrite -> filterlim_comp_2 in FP; [|apply filterlim_pair with (g:= fst) (f:= snd) | apply filterlim_pair with (g:= fst) (f:= fst) | apply filterlim_id]. rewrite -> filterlim_id in FP. apply FP.
